description: The first four episodes from the ABC comedy documentary series, The Games. Episode 1: John and Gina meet the Sydney spindoctors while Bryan finds the unbelievable - a willing sponsor with millions to spend. Episode 2: John confronts the threat of the Millenium Bug, and finds a worldwide audience for The Games on the Net. Episode 3: Our team goes bush to a conference centre to workshop the problems they face at The Games. Episode 4: The consultants are out to get Bryan but our team proves that home-grown expertise can beat corporate slickness any day. Written by John Clarke and Ross Stevenson.
